Installation(Normal):
-----------------------------
1. Run AutoCase.exe
2. AutoCase runs in background(you wont see any window dont freak out!)
3. if you desire to close it open TaskManger and search for AutoCase(32bit) and end process manually
4. and remember mistakes are outdated! :)
------------------------------



Installation(For Startup Run):
-------------------------------------
1. Open run and type "shell:startup"
2. This will open startup folder where u need to paste AutoCase.exe
3. Now everytime your system starts AutoCase will automatically run in background
4. if you desire to close it open TaskManger and search for AutoCase(32bit) and end process manually
5. and remember mistakes are outdated! :)
---------------------------------------


About:
-----------------------------------
